author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Communist Party of India (CPI), Puducherry unit has condemned the delay in disbursal of pension to the old-age persons in the Union Territory.

In a statement CPI unit secretary R.Viswanathan said as the ruling All India NR Congress (AINRC) Government failed to convene the Legislative Assembly on time to get its approval for vote-on-account, several old-age persons are undergoing severe hardships without getting their monthly pension on the seventh day of the month. They are dragged to angavadi centres and banks in anticipation of their monthly benefits.

“It is really distressing to see old people being dragged to pillar to post,” said Mr. Viswanathan. He urged the Lieutenant Governor to intervene and initiate steps.
title: CPI condemns delay in pension disbursal
